item.title: Angular Pokemon
item.description: Pokemon https://pokeapi.co/ https://pokeapi.co/docs/v2 https://pokeapi.co/api/v2//{id or name} Endpoints: items Berries Locations, etc Posibles Ampliaciones BÃºsqueda por imagen price evolution App Creation ng new poke-app --style=scss --routing=false Packages ng add @angular/material --theme=indigo-pink --typography=true --animations=true This should add some entries to index.html <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@300;400;500&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"> <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet"> and the sytles.css /* You can add global styles to this file, and also import other style files */ html, body { height: 100%; } body { margin: 0; font-family: Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; } the app.
